name: Floraling Jump
description:
Floralings are plant-like creatures. And, just like plants, they need a lot of care (and watering) to make them grow well. Care for your Floralings to level up their stats, then take part in trampoline-based tournaments in your quest to win medals!

You can also buy items to help train your Floralings. Or dress them up in different outfits to show off your style! And, there's a mystery about a famous Floraling's mysterious disappearance...
